release.action: Persistent enumeration lookup methods in PersistentEnumerationDao renamed from "get" to "getByName".
Added extra lookup methods into PersistentEnumerationDao along with AbstractHibernateEnumerationDaoTest update.
Added bitemporal pattern support that extends the standard persistent entity model along with corresponding test cases.
Added compile-scoped Joda Time dependency to daofusion-core POM.
Fixed issue "Add countAll() methods to PersistentEntityDao".
Fixed issue "CriteriaTransferObject#add() Javadoc update".
Fixed issue "Utility class for commonly used PropertyFilterCriterionProvider instances".

Fixed issue "Property path refactoring". Original methods working with the propertyPath / associationJoinType concept are now marked as deprecated in favor of the associationPath / targetPropertyName approach.
Major code review and refactoring of daofusion-core.
NestedPropertyCriterion subclasses can now be constructed via specific builders as an alternative to using constructors.
Added SimpleFilterCriterionProvider as a convenience base class for simple FilterCriterionProvider (former PropertyFilterCriterionProvider) implementations.
Added FilterValueConverters utility class for most common FilterValueConverter (former FilterValueObjectProvider) implementations.
FilterValueConverter (former FilterValueObjectProvider) and FilterAndSortMapping are now parametrized to ensure type safety when working with CTO mappings.
Added implicit clone operation support for PersistentEntity and MutablePersistentEntity.
Removed HibernateHelper from daofusion-core. Hibernate Criteria instance modifications should now be performed via AssociationPathRegister.
Corrected cascade type definitions on Customer and Order entities within daofusion-test. This could potentionally cause ConstraintViolationExceptions when deleting related entities.
GPL license as well as the LGPL one are now placed under src/main/resources.
Fixed issue "Request for merging functionality - NestedPropertyCriteria".
Fixed issue "Problem with findSubCriteria in com.anasoft.os.daofusion.criteria.NestedPropertyCriteria - incorrect result criteria hierarchy".
Fixed issue "org.h2.jdbc.JdbcSQLException thrown after running core integration tests for H2 database".
Persistent property name constant NAME changed to _NAME in PersistentEnumeration.
CriteriaTransferObjectCountWrapperTest updated to use @Mock annotations in conjunction with MockitoJUnitRunner.
Added LGPL license under src/main/resources/license directory.

release.description: Initial release of the the 1.1.x branch
release.action: Fixed issue "H2: NestedPropertyCriteria created by NestedPropertyCriteriaBasedConverter fails within AbstractHibernateEntityDao#count()". Implementation includes a server-side CriteriaTransferObject wrapper for entity instance count purposes (CriteriaTransferObjectCountWrapper) along with the corresponding unit test.
Updated BaseHibernateDataAccessor#rowCount() method - now a check is made whether the "rowCount" projection results in a single Integer value (if not, a warning is logged and zero is returned).
Updated Javadoc within PersistentEntityDao / AbstractHibernateEntityDao / BaseHibernateDataAccessor to clarify things about the "rowCount" projection stuff.
Updated AbstractHibernateEntityDaoTest: performing instance count on a result set with multiple instances, which is shaped by FilterCriterion instances.
FilterAndSortMapping#apply() method now checks if FilterAndSortCriteria contains any filter values prior to adding corresponding FilterCriterion into the NestedPropertyCriteria.
Updated NestedPropertyCriteriaBasedConverterTest: converting criteria transfer object that contains FilterAndSortCriteria instances without any filter values.
Added test-scoped Mockito dependency to the parent POM.
Added test-scoped "slf4j-simple" dependency to the parent POM (default SLF4J binding for unit tests).
Removed dependency to "slf4j-jcl" from daofusion-core POM. This way, users have the possibility to specify desired SLF4J binding on their own.
Removed dependency to "maven-eclipse-plugin" from the parent POM.
Removed "final" keyword for fields within CriteriaTransferObject and FilterAndSortCriteria to allow proper class serialization.
Added default constructor with "protected" visibility into FilterAndSortCriteria to allow proper class deserialization.
Added "clearFilterValues" method into FilterAndSortCriteria.
Added convenience constructor into FilterCriterion regarding single filter object value path or a single direct value for a specific NestedPropertyJoinType.
Initial release.
